text: Bah - humbug! Younes Bendjima and Scott Disick reportedly met at the Kardashian Christmas Party & let ’ s just say, they prob won ’ t sit next to each other at XMas dinner. Kourtney Kardashian ‘ s ex and current boyfriend finally came face - to - face at Kris Jenner ‘ s annual Christmas Eve party and according to sources, it was NOT all merry and bright! Younes Bendjima, 24, attended his first ever Kardashian Christmas party with Kourt, 38, and was inevitably introduced to his GF ’ s baby - daddy and ex, Scott Disick.
